message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the exact-repair tradeoff in distributed storage systems, which involves information theory and coding theory. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.DS (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses code constructions, which falls under cs.SI (Systems and Control) and cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Finally, the paper involves the study of tradeoffs, which can be related to optimization and algorithms, falling under cs.CC (Computational Complexity).
